ComicInfo.Summary:
Seize The Time - 5 pages - writers: Dan Mishkin and Gary Cohn, artists: Pat Broderick and John Celardo, letterer: Pierre Bernard, Jr., colorist: Carl Gafford, editor: Mike W. Barr
Creature Commandos - The Monster Marines - 1 page by Dave Manak
Last Chance - 3 pages - writer: Mike W. Barr, artist: Dan Spiegle, letterer: John Costanza, colorist: Carl Gafford, editor: Len Wein
The Avenging Ones - 7 pages - writer: Paul S. Newman, artist: Fred Carillo, letterer: Esphidy, colorist: Jerry Serpe, editor: Len Wein
The Turnabout Battle - 2 pages - writer: Robin Snyder, artist: Angel Trinidad Jr.
Death For Hire - 6 pages - writer: Paul S. Newman, artist: Rubeny, letterer: Mahilum, colorist: Jerry Serpe, editor: Mike W. Barr
The Return of Wander One - 3 pages - writer: Mike W. Barr, artist: Trevor Von Eeden & Bob Smith, letterer: Pierre Bernard, colorist: Jerry Serpe, editor: Len Wein
